official_title: A Feasibility Study Evaluating Storytelling Through Music Intervention with Bereaved Parents of Children with Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* >18 years old
* able to read and speak English
* bereaved parent of a child who died from cancer (ages<39 years)
* child's death >6 months and <5 years before study initiation
* access to the internet and computer.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
exclusion_criteria: * do not have the technological requirements for Zoom interviews and REDCap surveys.
